import React from 'react' import './checkout-item.styles.scss' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import { clerarCartItem } from '../../redux/cart/cartactions' import { removeItem } from '../../redux/cart/cartactions' const CheckoutItem = ({item, clearCart, removeItem}) => { const {imageUrl, name, quantity, price } = item return(
{name}
removeItem(item)}>❮
{quantity}
removeItem(item)}>❯
{price}
clearCart(item)}>✖
) } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ clearCart : item => dispatch(clerarCartItem(item)), removeItem: item => dispatch(removeItem(item)) }) export default connect(null,mapDispatchToProps)(CheckoutItem)
